reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Tuberculosis Prevention and Control for Vulnerable Populations

description.narrative: Myanmar - Tuberculosis - Save the Children Federation, Inc. - STC HQ. This program has the following goals: To End the TB epidemic in Myanmar (Fewer than 10 cases per 100,000 population by 2035). The objectives of this program are: Objective 1: accelerate the decline in the prevalence of drug-sensitive and drug-resistant TB. Objective 2: fully integrate TB prevention and care in Universal Health Coverage. Objective 3: enhance the prevention of TB, particularly for high-risk populations
